mapper.sql: f_id, f_teacher_id, f_name, "f_teacher_reminder", f_deadline_time, f_status, f_is_delete, f_createtime, f_creator_id, f_updatetime, f_updater_id
mapper.select:
select
from t_teaching where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f_is_delete = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_teaching (f_id, f_teacher_id, f_name, f_teacher_reminder, f_deadline_time, f_status, f_is_delete, f_createtime, f_creator_id, f_updatetime, f_updater_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherReminder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_teaching
f_teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_teacher_reminder = #{teacherReminder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_deadline_time = #{deadlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_teaching set f_teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_teacher_reminder = #{teacherReminder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_deadline_time = #{deadlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tt.f_id, tt.f_teacher_id, tt.f_name, tt.f_teacher_reminder, DATE_FORMAT(tt.f_deadline_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'deadlineTime', tt.f_status, tt.f_creator_id, te.f_name as teacherName from t_teaching tt left join t_teacher te on tt.f_teacher_id = te.f_id where tt.f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tt.f_is_delete = false

select tt.f_id, tt.f_teacher_id, tt.f_name, tt.f_teacher_reminder, tt.f_deadline_time, tt.f_status, tt.f_creator_id, te.f_name as teacherName from t_teaching tt left join t_teacher te on tt.f_teacher_id = te.f_id where tt.f_name = #{name} and tt.f_is_delete = false

select tt.f_id, tt.f_teacher_id, tt.f_name, tt.f_teacher_reminder, tt.f_deadline_time, tt.f_status, tt.f_creator_id, te.f_name as teacherName from t_teaching tt left join t_teacher te on tt.f_teacher_id = te.f_id where tt.f_creator_id = #{creatorId} and tt.f_is_delete = false
and tt.f_status != 3
and tt.f_status = 3

select tt.f_id, tt.f_teacher_id, tt.f_name, tt.f_teacher_reminder, DATE_FORMAT(tt.f_deadline_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'deadlineTime', tt.f_status, tt.f_creator_id, te.f_name as teacherName from t_teaching tt left join t_teacher te on tt.f_teacher_id = te.f_id where tt.f_id = #{teachingId} and tt.f_is_delete = false
